intro: Pircunia stricta, commonly known as the narrowleaf pircunia, is a flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of South America. It belongs to the family Campanulaceae, which includes bellflowers and similar species. The plant is characterized by its upright growth habit and narrow, lance-shaped leaves.
